benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/invoicePayments/{paymentId}/customFields - Add custom fields to payment

covered: Comprehensive Valid Payload coverage: happy path scenarios (TC01), header variations (TC02), existing/no existing custom fields scenarios (TC03/TC04), multiple fields (TC05), and large payloads (TC15); plus unicode (TC21) and integration tests (TC24-TC25) for persistence and cross-system consistency.
Authorization and header handling: tests cover valid CreatedBy usage and missing/invalid authentication scenarios (TC12) as well as missing header cases (TC09).

Error handling and validation: malformed JSON (TC08), missing header (TC09), invalid paymentId format (TC10), non-existent paymentId (TC11), extra/unsupported fields (TC06, TC17), duplicate fields (TC20), partial input (TC16), SQL injection/XSS (TC14), and Unicode handling (TC21).
Edge cases and robustness: empty body (TC07), unsupported query parameters (TC17), and network timeout/slow responses (TC18) are covered.
Concurrency and performance: concurrency (TC19) and performance/stress scenarios (TC22, TC23) are included.
Integration and data persistence: checks that created fields persist and are retrievable (TC24) and reflected across systems (TC25).
gaps: Rate limiting/throttling scenarios are not covered.
Caching behavior verification (ETag/Cache-Control) is not covered.
Internal server error scenario (500) not explicitly tested.
Explicit 403 Forbidden coverage beyond 401/400 cases is not present.
Data-type validation for CustomField properties (e.g., numeric vs string) could be deeper.
recommendations: Add rate-limiting tests and caching header checks, and introduce an explicit 500 Internal Server Error scenario.
Include dedicated 403 Forbidden tests for insufficient permissions, not just 401/400 scenarios.
Enhance data-type validation tests for CustomField properties (e.g., invalid types for fieldName or fieldValue).
Consider adding a dedicated set of malformed-input tests to ensure consistent 400 responses across diverse invalid payloads.
